metadata.title: CVE-2017-16611 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In libXfont before 1.5.4 and libXfont2 before 2.0.3, a local attacker canopen (but not read) files on the system as root, triggering tape rewinds,watchdogs, or similar mechanisms that can be triggered by opening files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16611` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxfont1 - 1:1.5.1-1ubuntu0.16.04.4
No subscription required

libxfont2 - 1:2.0.1-3~ubuntu16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxfont package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.5.1-1ubuntu0.16.04.4').
libxfont2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.1-3~ubuntu16.04.3').
